title: Deep Learning Assessment Competency Enhancement Program in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods to evaluate the effectiveness of blended learning (online/offline) in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Design and application of tools to assess higher-order thinking skills (analysis, evaluation, creativity) in blended learning environments.
Development of a self-assessment system to measure interactive learning outcomes in simulation/VR-based environments.
Design and implementation of project-based assessment tasks that promote reflective learning.
Analysis of differences in deep learning effects based on learner characteristics (gender, career, field).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
